alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:01AM MDT until August 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY, AUGUST 06... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Mitchell. * WHEN...Until Saturday, August 06. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, the lower banks overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Friday was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 16.9 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 AM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon James River Mitchell 17.0 17.9 Fri 7 AM 17.7 17.6 17.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
